divs: Sighting Detailswe stopped outside of south fulton, ny for a nature call. crystal clear night with many stars. i looked up and saw a large orange cigar shaped object moving slowly from the north it stopped and a piece of the same color fell from it. we watched the piece fall and al of a sudden it bursts into flames, the object then moved slowly off into the same direction it came from. **** i wish one of your speakers would ask the critics: if the air force wanted to "prove" to the public the the roswell object was a weather ballon, why didn't they show the inflatable part of the ballon to prove it?
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fulton
There were 4 other sightings in Fulton on or around October 29th 1969
